# Load Packages
Code chunk below loads the packages:

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(ggHoriPlot, ggthemes, tidyverse)
```
:::


# Import dataset
Code chunk below imports the dataset:

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
averp <- read_csv("data/AVERP.csv") %>%
  mutate(`Date` = dmy(`Date`))
```
:::
